#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

vector <int> v[2002];
int d[2002];

int main()
{
    int n,m,q1,x;
   
    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &q1);
    for ( int i = 0; i < n; i++ ) {
        vector <int> v1;
        for ( int j = 0; j < m; j++ ) {
            scanf("%d", &x);
            v1.push_back(x);
        }
        for ( int j = 0; j < m; j++ ) {
            for ( int k = j+1; k < m; k++ ) {
                if ( v1[j] == v1[k] ) continue;
                v[v1[j]].push_back(v1[k]);
                v[v1[k]].push_back(v1[j]);
            }
        }
    }
    memset(d, -1, sizeof(d));
    d[42] = 0;
    queue <int> q;
    q.push(42);
    while ( !(q.empty()) ) {
          int f = q.front();
          q.pop();
          for ( int i = 0; i < v[f].size(); i++ ) {
              if ( d[v[f][i]] == -1 || d[v[f][i]] > d[f] + 1 ) {
                 d[v[f][i]] = d[f] + 1;
                 q.push(v[f][i]);
              }
          }
    }
    
    
    while ( q1-- ) {
          scanf("%d", &x);
          printf("%d\n", d[x]);
    }
    return 0;
}
